Platforms: Platform: Economy & Resources

Manifesto of a Regenerative Economy

The economy is not a wealth-generating machine; it is the metabolic system of our civilization. The current model, obsessed with infinite growth, is consuming its host—the planet. We propose a new paradigm: an economy that functions like a natural ecosystem—circular, regenerative, and symbiotic.

Key Principles:

  • From Growth to Health: We replace GDP with a System Health Index. The goal is not to get bigger, but to become healthier, more resilient, and more efficient in the use of energy and resources.
  • From Extraction to Circulation: We shift the tax burden from creative labor to destructive resource extraction and pollution. The concept of 'waste' is eliminated at the design level, as all materials circulate in either technical or biological cycles.
  • From Competition to Symbiosis: We develop economic models that reward cooperation and systemic contribution. A business's success is measured by its positive impact on the environment and society, with profit being a means to sustain the mission, not the ultimate goal.
